name: Outbreak (itch) (rm101)
description: You are a lone survivor amidst a zombie outbreak. Your only hope for survival is to reach a group of survivors outside the city limits before the time expires. You must navigate through your neighborhood, into the bunker ruins and through underground tunnels all while avoiding hoards of zombies. You must reach the exits in time or else your group will leave you behind! Stay alive and reach the exits before time runs out to win.
